name: Where monsters hide
description:
Play a cool dungeon crawler with randomly generated stages that choose out of 17 different room layouts. Fight against two different kind of enemies and two different bosses. Fight with either your sword or your bow whilst also doging attacks from enemies.

The game used to have a working highscore system but in this version it isn't pressent due to it chrashing the game. You can still open the highscore menu and you are required to enter a name, but these things don't do anything anymore.

Where monsters hide was a game made for the first school project at our game development study. We worked on the game for about 6 months. We programmed the game in Java using the Prossesing librarys. We also made almost alle the sprite our selfs. The dungeon tileset was copied from HeartBeast with some slight adjustments.
